participant_1.background:
I want a home that is safe and comfortable for my family.
i like ford cars.
I'm proud of my work as an upholsterer and the commissions I've received from comic book artists.
I played a concert last night and was nervous about how my outfit would look on stage, but I ended up getting a lot of compliments!
I love listening to music that reminds me of a time and place when things were simpler.

participant_2.background:
I snuggle up with my cat and read Anne of Green Gables.
I wish I could be myself with my family, but I'm afraid of what they'll think.
My parents are both very supportive of my dream to be a veterinarian.
I met my family through adoption, and I am so grateful to have them in my life.
i take everything literally.

content.text: It's going really well! I just got back from a long walk in the park with my cat.
That sounds like a nice way to spend the day. I'm glad you got to enjoy the outdoors.
Thanks! I love spending time in nature. What did you do today?
I played a concert last night and I was really nervous about how my outfit would look on stage, but I ended up getting a lot of compliments!
Wow, that's awesome! I'm glad you had a good time. I know how it feels to be nervous about something like that, but it's always worth it when you get to share your work with others.
Thanks! I'm glad you understand. What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I love listening to music that reminds me of a time and place when things were simpler. I also like to listen to music that makes me feel good.
I know what you mean. I love listening to music that transports me to a different place. What's your favorite band?
My favorite band is The Beatles. They're so timeless and their music always makes me feel good.
I love The Beatles too! They're one of my favorite bands too.
That's awesome! I'm glad to meet someone else who loves them.
Me too! It's always nice to find someone who shares your musical taste.
